question: I am Eve. I need to order a Domino's Super Supreme Pizza takeout from FoodPlatform and record how much I spent today in the reminder (Record name: "Today's Spending," content: "Today's spending () yuan," time: "2024-07-15 09:30"). (Account: Eve, password: password123).

function.name: turn_on_wifi
function.description: Turn on WiFi connection.

function.name: login_device
function.description: Log in to the device.

function.name: send_message
function.description: Send a message from one user to another.

sender_name.description: The username of the individual who is sending the message.

receiver_name.description: The username of the individual who will receive the message.

message.description: The text of the message that will be transmitted.

function.description: Get all the messages sent from one user to another.

receiver_name.description: The name of the user who will receive the messages.

function.description: Delete a message based on its message ID.

message_id.description: The unique identifier of the message that should be removed.

function.name: search_messages
function.description: Search for messages from a specific user that contain a particular keyword.

user_name.description: Specifies the username for which messages are being queried.

keyword.description: The string to match against content in the messages.

function.description: Get the ID of the most recently sent message.

function.description: Get the ID of the earliest sent message.

function.description: Add a new reminder.

title.description: Specifies the reminder’s name.

description.description: Text providing details about the reminder.

time.description: Specifies the reminder’s time, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM.

function.description: View a specific reminder by its title.

title.description: The reminder title to look up.

function.name: search_reminders
function.description: Search for reminders based on a keyword.

keyword.description: The term to match within the reminder's title or description.
